Name: Gloom Lifter
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: An Irish whiskey and cognac sour served straight-up.
History: Adapted from a recipe in David A. Embury 's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Gloom Lifter contains 192 calories
